website_summaries.verdict: A spacious model with nice graphics, but it also comes with the potential for some frustrating quality issues.
pros: Has graphics that owners prefer over "self-stirring mug" inscribed on some other models
13.5-ounce size is perfect for numerous beverages
cons: Some issues with the handle cracking at the base have been reported
At least one customer got a "lemon

customer_reviews.title: Hand wash only!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased several of these in the past year. By far this is the best one. All the other ones had the same two flaws which totaled the cups with a month or so. The lids all cracked within a couple weeks and no matter how careful I was, water got into the battery compartments. I have had zero issues with water getting into the battery area and the upgraded design on the lid has shown no signs of cracking. This is strictly a hand wash only item.
customer_reviews.author: JENNY L.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Self Stirring Option
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! The light bulb and the quote about coffee are on opposite sides of the mug (unlike the picture), but I am just glad I found one of these types of mugs that doesn't say "self stirring mug" on it. The mug feels like it is really high quality and is easy to hand wash.
customer_reviews.author: Megan's Mom

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE MUG, BUT QUIT AFTER 2 MONTHS!
customer_reviews.text: like this mug, BUT after just 2 months it won't work. Found 2 cracks in black plastic next to top edge of handle. Always hand washed, drain dry, and avoid battery area getting wet. Took apart unit (2 bottom screws) and when pulled loose, noticed water in-between black plastic and aluminum carafe, AND then pieces of black plastic fell off from area near top of handle. So, unsure if it came defective or not. $20 for 2-months of use is questionable?!?? Unsure if I'll buy another one. If I do, I will closely inspect it upon receipt BEFORE using it.
customer_reviews.author: GKittyBrown

customer_reviews.title: Great short term but not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: **lowered my rating due to durability issues** lasted 6 months before cracking at handle due to cyclic stress. Never dropped. Everything praising the stir function is still true. The top isn’t screw on. If you intend to use this at a single desk of small treks with few stairs this is great, but my job requires long treks from place to place and going up and down ladders sometimes. It mixes like a dream. The little magnetic spinner is removable for cleaning, and it is a powerful vortex builder. They need to add this tech to vacuum sealed coffee cups with screw tops!
customer_reviews.author: Emonds D. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. I got it to work a couple of times but otherwise the magnetic capsule in the bottom did not spin. I had to give it a push to get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: DKlaudt

customer_reviews.title: Poor design compared to previous version.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Hasn’t worked correctly, ever. This is the second cup I’ve bought, the first works well but the plastic handle and outside is very brittle and cracked. The magnetic pill-shaped mixer always jumps out of its recessed spot, thus not able to stir my drink. Either the motor has too much torque, the magnet is not strong enough, or the ridged recess is not high enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Luv This Mug! BUT.......
customer_reviews.text: Luv this cup. This is my second one. The first one had a cat on it, but same shape. It broke at the handle. Cracked all the way down. So I bought this one. Looks the same except graphics. I just saw now this one is cracked, same place under the handle. I just bought this one in Feb. So 3 months and trash. I use it every morning for 2 cups of coffee with supplements. Washed and set on dish rack till next morning. So why are they breaking? Oh well, I'll get another design and see if it lasts longer for 1/2 the price. But I really really luv these mugs when not cracked! Sherry:)
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Great Stirring Cup
customer_reviews.text: This is my second stirring cup, I love it! Great for everyday coffee use. I had to get a second one because of so much use and wash caused the bottom where batteries are located to get corroded. But, for the price its still a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Great Movie

customer_reviews.title: does the job & a fun product. but has it's downside.
customer_reviews.text: first of all, i gotta say this product is so much fun. i bought for some office jokes and i enjoy this product very much. also, it really does it's job and stirs the coffee or soup or whatever else you pour into it. only downside i found to it is, that after a few uses it starts to make loud noises and it's really Distressing. that's the only reason i gave it 4 stars. if it was still quiet after a 2-week use (i got it 2 weeks ago), i would Definitely give it a 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: orplag

customer_reviews.title: Good cup
customer_reviews.text: I received this from my son as a present. I like tea and used this for my tea. I like that it will stir the honey in my drink - just don't leave your teabag in because it will shred it. I do like this cup (hey I like gadgets), It looks good, works well and does a good job at mixing the water.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great the first time I used it. I carefully had washed it because I wasn't sure if water would damage the internal mechanism. Went to use it the second time and nothing. Batteries were new, but I tried another set, just in case. Nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Jean

customer_reviews.title: I only used the mug three times and it fell apart!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The mug fell apart after only three uses. I barely got any use out of it which is a bummer because my main reason for purchasing it was for convenience and what I thought was a clever design. I reached out to the seller to have it resolved, but received no response. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Q. London

customer_reviews.title: This is a blast to use
customer_reviews.text: My wife has a medication that gets dissolved in fruit juice. It doesnt dissolve easily so this is a wrist saver. Just let it whirl away on ts own until satisfied its mixed up. Makes this medication fun.
customer_reviews.author: the curtster

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long!
customer_reviews.text: Poor product! Worked for 5 days and never submerged or dish washer. Switch quit working. If they fixed the poor quality, it be very cool thing. But come on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No instructions came with the mug.
customer_reviews.text: I can't figure out how to put the batteries in. I doesn't say on the box that it is a mug that stirs either. I got it as a grab bag. So whoever gets it will not know that it is supposed to stir. I came in a cheap box with just Kaure & kind on it......NOTHING ELSE.
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: It's a thing you think you don't need until you ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a thing you think you don't need until you use it. Before using this product: Pfff! I'm not a lazy person. I can stir my coffee using my own hands. After using this product: I have realized that I can't stir my coffee as well as this device. I can't live without it now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Amazingly Well.
customer_reviews.text: This mug works amazingly well. I’m very impressed. Based on previous reviews, I’m being extra careful in cleaning the mug and not holding it directly from the handle to prevent it from breaking. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: K. E. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Came on time.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for dad for Christmas he says it’s still working a month later and has done coffee and cocktails with it. Took awhile to get it open though.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Nice mug.
customer_reviews.text: Very innovative. My grandson will love this. I got him some hot chocolate to go along with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Say goodbye to the spoon!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and inventive my wife loves it she was the head of the office with this new mug. Easy to clean and really really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice mug
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. Read many reviews of other cups that quit working right away. Only complaint, zero instructions. Glad I read all the reviews to know how to care for mug.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Cheatham

customer_reviews.title: I like this
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this product and was expecting something to go wrong. However, it was an amazing product. Very much satisfied
customer_reviews.author: TL Brown

customer_reviews.title: Cracked at the handle!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a mug and loved it. I noticed a crack at the handle and thought I must have hit on accident for it to crack. I bought another, but the second mug cracked as well (same location). I KNOW that I did not hit the mug this time. Seems to be defective!
customer_reviews.author: UNHAPPY

customer_reviews.title: Poor longevity, but otherwise great product
customer_reviews.text: An absolute fantastic item! Little ones can make their own hot chocolate without making a mess. However, it suddenly stopped working, even after putting a new battery. Poor longevity!
customer_reviews.author: Andres Ramgoolam

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When I push the stir button nothing happens.I am not sure what is supposed to make it stir but it's not doing it.Sooo disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tenille

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea for coffee lover!
customer_reviews.text: It does keep my coffee hot a lot longer and stir my coffee at any time.
customer_reviews.author: gary seidel

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I used had been using this for 6 weeks when the handle broke off. Another piece of junk sold by Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Ehren

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and great build quantity
customer_reviews.text: Stronger than you think... Works well and is powerful enough to whip up most drinks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, the stirring mechanism broke after two uses
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Cella

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The old coffee guys at work give me crap about being lazy but I love this! Lol
customer_reviews.author: William cundith

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for long.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the concept of the cup and absolutely loved it....while it worked! Unfortunately, it only lasted a month then stopped working. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kory

customer_reviews.title: It’s amazing, like no joke
customer_reviews.text: It was very impressive cup, it was worth the buy. Also as a bonus sounds like a garage disposable.
customer_reviews.author: Specks

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My second one , works great ! Last long time
customer_reviews.author: Jin Hirsch

customer_reviews.title: Great idea and fit.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the portable mixer I was looking for. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Martin Hellewell

customer_reviews.title: Internal wiring defective, disabling spinning of magnet
customer_reviews.text: Internal wire becomes disconnected defeating the spinning of white magnet inside the mug.
customer_reviews.author: Len Gross

customer_reviews.title: Really Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a gift, but as soon as I opened the box, I noticed the product comes scratched. I could not give this as a gift because it looks old and used.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Penaranda

customer_reviews.title: Great for bullet coffee!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cup. Had a few bugs to work out but great support from company.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen Bono

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Upper handle started cracking and chipping after a few days. Returned product.
customer_reviews.author: Rakesh Shukla

customer_reviews.title: Not since the discovery of the wheel has Man advanced so far in such a short amount of time
customer_reviews.text: This thing is better than expected. I got it today and have used it about a half a dozen times and it is so great at mixing drinks and so fun to watch it work that I would strongly urge anybody on the fence about buying one to make the purchase before Congress is informed and makes them illegal.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Disintegrated after less than a week of use.  Returned and will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: The second one I bought lasted less than a week before the outside plastic just started falling off (Aug 2018). I notice another reviewer had the same problem - plastic falling off starting at the handle. The first one I bought lasted about 5 months, worked well, used about 1-2 times a day. I had given it a 5 star review. It stopped working after 5 months, so I bought a second one, which earned this less-than-one-star review. I have returned it and will not be purchasing another one.
customer_reviews.author: Customer in Berkeley, CA

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoyed the self stirring part of the cup
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the self stirring part of the cup, especially when drink beverage that tend to separate. But I wish the lid was a tighter seal. I already spill several times and becomes a hassle. The battery compartment and batteries get corroded and stops the cup from stirring
customer_reviews.author: Redwan Suleman

customer_reviews.title: Bulletproof solution
customer_reviews.text: This mug is the perfect solution for drinking bulletproof coffee in the office. At home I use a blender to emulsify the ingredients. That doesn't work so well in a small office. My favorite solution is this mug. Works like a charm and delivers super yummy coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my hubby, he likes it. He has been using it average a few times a week, Its been a few months now since I bought it, it's still working fine. Wish its a little bigger though
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: It is good Mug only
customer_reviews.text: When I try to steer anything in the cup, many times the capsule moved from its location so no steering and this for something wrong in the cup as i think. because i work in chemical labs has the same concept for steering the chemicals but the capsul not moved.
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad Marie

customer_reviews.title: Cups are great but stop working quick
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE CUPS, I have like 5 but they stop working quickly. I think it’s because no matter how careful you are cleaning them, they must still get water in them. I wish they could be perfected so they keep working. I’m tired of buying them and they don’t last.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy DeMent

customer_reviews.title: Travel mug
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would love this, but: I wanted a cup I could stir my Bulletproof coffee with and take it on the road. Love the stirring part, but no way is this a travel mug. To big for car cup holders and the top slips off to easy.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Whiteside

customer_reviews.title: This works really well.
customer_reviews.text: It stirs milk or cream or whatever you put in your coffee. It also cleans well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W.

customer_reviews.title: very easy to clean and maintain!
customer_reviews.text: very good product just doesn't fit in car cup holder, other than that works great.
customer_reviews.author: SlowHand 1851

customer_reviews.title: Needs new batteries every 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Love this cup EXCEPT... it has started burning through batteries every 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.author: MARIA SILVERMAN

customer_reviews.title: Died 6 weeks later
customer_reviews.text: purchase 4/5. stopped working 5/10. still a nice mug, even without the mixer.
customer_reviews.author: Drivetime

customer_reviews.title: Coffee taste is effected
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, but I don’t use it very often. It leaves a metallic taste in the coffee. All metal mugs do this. Personally I can’t enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great For Kids too
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this mug. He uses this for his hot chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine102

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use it to stir powder collagen into my coffee and keep it stirred in. My husband wanted on also.
customer_reviews.author: Lou P Lamberth

product_meta.title: Self stirring coffee mug - Automatic mixing stainless steel cup - To stir your coffee, tea, hot chocolate, milk, protein shake, bouillon, etc. - Ideal for office, school, gym, home - 400 ml / 13.5 oz
product_meta.description: Color:BlackKare & Kind self stirring coffee mug This next generation self stirring mug is the best and easiest way to automatically stir your hot or cold drinks! The spill-free twist open/close lid allows you to take your drink from your kitchen to the living room, bedroom, car, office, gym, school, etc. Ideal for coffee, tea, hot chocolate, milk, protein shakes, lemonade, bouillon and many other light mix drinks that you can stir. Easy to operate: Simply press the button once to start the automatic stirring. Press it again to stop the stirring. Easy to clean: The magnetic stirrer at the bottom of the cup can be quickly removed and placed back for easy cleaning. The top quality stainless steel assures years of leak free and safe stirring. Powered by two AAA batteries (not included). Contents: - 1x Self stirring coffee mug Kare & Kind-USPTO#87035676- is a registered trademark protected by US Trademark Law. Kare & Kind products are sold by authorized sellers only. This item ships in Kare & Kind retail packaging. If for any reason you are unhappy with any product by Kare & Kind, please do not hesitate to contact us. We take full ownership and responsibility for the quality of our products and will do our very best to solve your problem quickly and efficiently!
feature_bullets: This next generation self stirring mug is the best and easiest way to automatically stir your hot or cold drinks! The spill-free twist open/close lid allows you to take your drink from your kitchen to the living room, bedroom, car, office, gym, school, etc.
Ideal for coffee, tea, hot chocolate, milk, protein shakes, lemonade, bouillon and many other light mix drinks that you can stir.
Easy to operate: Simply press the button once to start the automatic stirring. Press it again to stop the stirring.
Easy to clean: The magnetic stirrer at the bottom of the cup can be quickly removed and placed back for easy cleaning.
The top quality stainless steel assures years of leak free and safe stirring. Powered by two AAA batteries (not included).
